text: Hello, how are you today?
I am doing good and you?
I am fine thanks, It's not been a long time I am on MTurk, but It is interesting how they are working on donating, Are you interested in donating?
Yes I donate to a few causes like breast cancer for women, autism awareness and March of dimes for children.
that is so nice of you. Have you ever heard about the organization "Save the Children" ?
Yes I have but don't know a whole lot about them since there are so many children related charities.
This is one of the biggest charities working for children. They work in almost 120 countries and on different issues related to children.
OK I will educate myself on them when we are done with our conversation.
That is good, We can talk about it too. It is their website if you like to visit:  URL
OK thanks. I reviewed the site quickly. Sure is sad to see so many children in distress around the world.
Yes it makes me very sad too, but it is also nice to be able to help small even small amount. I have a soft heart for children
Me too, since I am a parent of 2 children myself. As a parent you want to do all you can for them.

I agree with you. It makes my heart happy how people care about children. I think HIT donation is a good thin since websites usually have minimum payment option, but on HITs we can donate 1 cent or more, makes it so much easier.
Yes I don't mind if there is a feature I can turn on where every hit I do, a few cents go to the charity of my choice.
That is so sweet. I've learnt it from you. I will do the same since now. It might look small but I am sure it will end up big
Yes everything counts, that's how it starts. All we could do is our part since problem is so big.
And for some countries even few dollars is a big thing, like for getting vaccinated. It will guarantee many children's safety
I agree, Save the children foundation work with the children through out their lives to make sure they grow up in a safe environment and get a chance to succeed based on their website.
thank you for putting time on effort on this. It was such a pleasure to chat with you. Thanks for your attention and help. May all children live in health and happiness. Have a nice day!
Thanks for your time too. It was really nice chatting with you. Take care.
